title: Public relations
brief_description: Through the many changes in American life in the past twenty-five years, a new profession has come into being - the practice of public relations. Good public relations in business has become of prime importance and it is the public relations counsellor who is charged with the task of maintaining sound inter-relations of business, government, labour, and the public. This film discusses the advertising and other manifestations of this phase of modern business and presents some of the leaders in the field.
